guide.conclusion: Fun project and you learn and get music from it.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Use electrolytes to charge your iPod.

Relevant parts
  • Onion
  • Gatorade or Powerade
  • ipod
  • ipod USB charger

lines.text: Punch 2 holes in the onion. Then pour two cups of Gatorade or Powerade and soak the onion in it for 30 minutes.
lines.text_raw: Punch 2 holes in the onion. Then pour two cups of Gatorade or Powerade and soak the onion in it for 30 minutes.

lines.text: After 30 minutes take it out and dry it off. Then plug the end of the USB cable into the onion. It will take a minute for it to work.
lines.text_raw: After 30 minutes take it out and dry it off. Then plug the end of the USB cable into the onion. It will take a minute for it to work.

guide.summary: Use electrolytes to charge your iPod.
guide.title: Charge an iPod with an Onion
